Organization.name: Amnesty International
Organization.description: A global movement campaigning for human rights and advocating for refugees and migrants.

Organization.name: Human Rights Watch
Organization.description: An international NGO that conducts research and advocacy on human rights issues, including the treatment of refugees and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Save the Children
Organization.description: A global organization focused on improving the lives of children, including providing support to refugee and migrant children.

Organization.name: International Rescue Committee (IRC)
Organization.description: An NGO providing emergency aid and long-term assistance to refugees and displaced people.

Organization.name: Doctors Without Borders (Médecins Sans Frontières)
Organization.description: An international medical humanitarian organization providing medical care in conflict zones and to those displaced by conflict.

Organization.name: Oxfam International
Organization.description: A confederation of 20 NGOs working together to end poverty and provide humanitarian assistance to refugees.

Organization.name: Red Cross / Red Crescent
Organization.description: A humanitarian organization providing emergency assistance, disaster relief, and education, including services for refugees and migrants.

Organization.name: CARE International
Organization.description: A global humanitarian organization fighting global poverty and providing relief in emergencies, including support for displaced populations.

Organization.name: Refugees International
Organization.description: An advocacy group focused on generating lifesaving humanitarian assistance and protection for displaced people around the world.

Organization.name: Caritas Internationalis
Organization.description: A Catholic charity organization providing humanitarian aid, development, and social services to refugees and vulnerable people.

Organization.name: Asylum Access
Organization.description: An NGO empowering refugees by advocating for their legal rights and providing legal aid.

Organization.name: Humanity & Inclusion
Organization.description: An NGO providing support to people with disabilities and vulnerable populations in situations of poverty and exclusion, conflict, and disaster.

Organization.name: Terre des Hommes
Organization.description: A network of organizations working to improve the lives of children worldwide, including those in refugee and migration contexts.

Organization.name: The Migrant Clinic
Organization.description: An organization providing free medical care and support to migrants and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Adopt a Refugee
Organization.description: An organization focused on connecting sponsors with refugees in need of resettlement assistance.

Organization.name: Women's Refugee Commission
Organization.description: An organization advocating for the rights and protection of displaced women and children.

Organization.name: Solidarités International
Organization.description: A humanitarian organization providing assistance to people affected by conflict, including refugees and displaced persons.

Organization.name: Action Against Hunger
Organization.description: An NGO working to end hunger and malnutrition, providing food security and nutrition assistance to refugees and displaced people.

Organization.name: Migration Policy Institute
Organization.description: A think tank that analyzes the movement of people worldwide and provides recommendations for managing migration and supporting refugees.

Organization.name: Relief International
Organization.description: A humanitarian organization providing emergency relief, rehabilitation, and development programs for vulnerable communities, including refugees.

Organization.name: Freedom House
Organization.description: An NGO dedicated to the expansion of freedom and democracy worldwide, including advocating for the rights of refugees.

Organization.name: World Relief
Organization.description: A humanitarian organization providing disaster relief, refugee resettlement, and community development.

Organization.name: Open Society Foundations
Organization.description: An international grant-making network supporting initiatives in education, public health, human rights, and legal reform, including refugee support.

Organization.name: Save the Children UK
Organization.description: The UK branch of Save the Children, focusing on children's rights and providing support to refugee and migrant children.

Organization.name: The Refugee Council
Organization.description: A UK-based NGO providing support and advice to refugees and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Asylum Aid
Organization.description: A UK-based charity providing legal advice and representation to asylum seekers and refugees.

Organization.name: Refugee Action
Organization.description: A UK charity that helps refugees and asylum seekers to build safe and productive lives in the UK.

Organization.name: Safe Passage
Organization.description: A UK-based organization working to secure safe and legal routes for refugees, particularly unaccompanied children, to reach safety.

Organization.name: REDRESS
Organization.description: An NGO working to obtain justice for survivors of torture, including refugees who have suffered from torture.

Organization.name: Medical Justice
Organization.description: A UK-based organization providing medical advice and assistance to immigration detainees and advocating for their rights.

Organization.name: Student Action for Refugees (STAR)
Organization.description: A network of student groups across the UK working to improve the lives of refugees and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Refugee Support Network
Organization.description: An organization that helps young refugees and asylum seekers access education and build better futures.

Organization.name: London Solidarity Network
Organization.description: A grassroots organization providing support and advocacy for refugees, migrants, and asylum seekers in London.

Organization.name: Bail for Immigration Detainees (BID)
Organization.description: A UK charity challenging immigration detention through the provision of legal advice, information, and representation.

Organization.name: Migrants' Rights Network
Organization.description: A UK-based organization advocating for migrants' rights and promoting the fair treatment of migrants in the UK.

Organization.name: Rights in Exile Programme
Organization.description: A global network offering legal advice and representation to refugees and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Aditus Foundation
Organization.description: A Malta-based NGO focused on human rights advocacy, including the rights of refugees and migrants.

Organization.name: Greek Council for Refugees
Organization.description: An NGO providing legal and social support to refugees and asylum seekers in Greece.

Organization.name: Spanish Commission for Refugee Assistance (CEAR)
Organization.description: A Spanish NGO offering legal, social, and humanitarian assistance to refugees, asylum seekers, and migrants.

Organization.name: Jesuit Refugee Service Europe
Organization.description: A faith-based organization offering support, legal assistance, and advocacy for refugees and asylum seekers across Europe.

Organization.name: Italian Council for Refugees (CIR)
Organization.description: An NGO providing legal and social services to refugees and asylum seekers in Italy.

Organization.name: France Terre d'Asile
Organization.description: An organization in France supporting refugees and asylum seekers through legal aid, housing, and integration services.

Organization.name: La Cimade
Organization.description: A French NGO providing support and advocacy for migrants, refugees, and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Forum Réfugiés-Cosi
Organization.description: A French organization offering legal assistance, housing, and social support to refugees and asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Emmaus France
Organization.description: A French NGO working with vulnerable populations, including refugees, to provide housing, employment, and social support.

Organization.name: Exil Solidarité
Organization.description: A French association dedicated to supporting asylum seekers and refugees in navigating the asylum process.

Organization.name: Groupe d'information et de soutien des immigré⋅e⋅s (GISTI)
Organization.description: A French organization providing legal advice and support to immigrants and refugees, and advocating for their rights.
